Affinity.DESCRIPTION: #yAffinity can be of any color NL between [A_Red], [A_Green], [A_Blue], [A_White], [A_Black], [A_Brown], [A_Yellow], [A_Pink], [A_Violet], [A_Teal]. NL [A_Gen] refers either to generic #yAffinity, or your current best #yAffinity.

Affinity Seal.DESCRIPTION: #ySealing a card transfers all its [A_Gen] to your [A_Gen] pool. Once per turn, #pRight-Click a card to manually #ySeal it.

Affinity Token.DESCRIPTION: Card which increases your #yAffinity for the rest of combat.

Multicolor.DESCRIPTION: Counts as an #yAffinity of each color.

Force.DESCRIPTION: When you gain [Force], also gain [Strength] (increases attack damage).

Agility.DESCRIPTION: When you gain [Agility], also gain [Dexterity] (increases block gain).

Blessing.DESCRIPTION: When you gain [Blessing], also gain [Enlightenment] (gain energy).

Intellect.DESCRIPTION: When you gain [Intellect], also gain [Focus] (increases orb amount).

Corruption.DESCRIPTION: When you gain [Corruption], also gain [Insanity] (add random cards to your draw pile).

Brown Threshold.DESCRIPTION: When you gain this power, also gain [Resistance] (trigger to add a Protect to your hand).

Yellow Threshold.DESCRIPTION: When you gain this power, also gain [Supercharge] (trigger to enter Divinity Stance).

Pink Threshold.DESCRIPTION: When you gain this power, also gain [Knowledge] (draw cards).

Violet Threshold.DESCRIPTION: When you gain this power, also gain [Pestilence] (increase common debuff amounts).

Teal Threshold.DESCRIPTION: When you gain this power, also gain [Innovation] (increase affinity gain amounts).

Divinity Stance.DESCRIPTION: Upon entering: Gain [E][E][E].  Triples damage dealt. Leave this stance at the end of your next turn.

Boost.DESCRIPTION: Gain the specified [A_Gen], and reduce the cost of upgrading its [A_Gen] power by #b1 until end of turn (does not stack).

Enchanted Armor.DESCRIPTION: For every point of [Enchanted Armor], take #b10% less #yAttack damage (max #b50%^) and convert #b1 [Block] to [THP] at the start of each turn.
